Hello World出力.title: Hello World Output
Hello World出力.question: Write a Java program that outputs the string "Hello, World!".

2つの数値の合計.title: Sum of Two Numbers
2つの数値の合計.question: Assign two integers (10 and 20) to variables and calculate and output their sum.

文字列を連結して挨拶.title: Concatenate Strings for Greeting
文字列を連結して挨拶.question: Define variable name = "Alice" and output "Hello, Alice!".

数値が正か負かゼロか判定.title: Determine if Number is Positive, Negative, or Zero
数値が正か負かゼロか判定.question: There is a variable num = -5. If this number is positive, output "Positive"; if negative, output "Negative"; if 0, output "Zero".

1から5まで出力.title: Output Numbers from 1 to 5
1から5まで出力.question: Use a for loop to output numbers from 1 to 5, one per line.

whileループで合計計算.title: Calculate Sum with While Loop
whileループで合計計算.question: Define variables sum = 0 and i = 1, and use a while loop to add i to sum while i is 5 or less, then output the final sum value.

配列の要素を出力.title: Output Array Elements
配列の要素を出力.question: Declare an integer array {10, 20, 30, 40, 50} and output each element separated by commas on one line.

メソッドで2つの数を足す.title: Add Two Numbers with Method
メソッドで2つの数を足す.question: Create a method add(int a, int b) that returns the sum of two integers. Call it from the main method with 5 and 10 and output the result.

配列の最大値を求める.title: Find Maximum Value in Array
配列の最大値を求める.question: Find and output the maximum value from integer array {15, 42, 8, 27, 33}.

曜日の判定.title: Determine Day of Week
曜日の判定.question: There is a variable day = 1. Use a switch statement to output the corresponding day name. 1=Monday, 2=Tuesday, ..., 7=Sunday. If it doesn't match, output "Invalid day".

文字列の長さを取得.title: Get String Length
文字列の長さを取得.question: Get and output the length of string "Hello Java".

文字列を大文字に変換.title: Convert String to Uppercase
文字列を大文字に変換.question: Convert string "hello world" to uppercase and output it.

文字列を置換.title: Replace String
文字列を置換.question: Replace "Java" with "World" in string "Hello Java" and output it.

文字列を分割.title: Split String
文字列を分割.question: Split string "apple,banana,orange" by comma and output each element on a separate line.

1から10の偶数を出力.title: Output Even Numbers from 1 to 10
1から10の偶数を出力.question: Output only even numbers from 1 to 10, separated by commas.

シンプルなクラスを作成.title: Create Simple Class
シンプルなクラスを作成.question: Create a Person class with a name field and getName() method. Create an instance with name "John" and output the name.

クラスの継承.title: Class Inheritance
クラスの継承.question: Create an Animal class with a speak method. Create a Dog class that extends Animal and overrides the speak method to return "Woof!".

インターフェースの実装.title: Implement Interface
インターフェースの実装.question: Define a calculateArea() method in Shape interface, implement it in Circle class, and return the area (78.5) of a circle with radius 5.

静的メソッドの使用.title: Using Static Methods
静的メソッドの使用.question: Create a static add(int a, int b) method in MathUtils class and output the result of adding 5 and 10.

定数の定義と使用.title: Define and Use Constants
定数の定義と使用.question: Define a final variable named PI with value 3.14159 and output its value.

ArrayListに要素を追加.title: Add Elements to ArrayList
ArrayListに要素を追加.question: Create a String ArrayList, add "apple", "banana", "orange", and output them separated by commas.

ArrayListのサイズを取得.title: Get ArrayList Size
ArrayListのサイズを取得.question: Add "red", "green", "blue" to an ArrayList and output its size (number of elements).

HashMapに追加と取得.title: Add and Get from HashMap
HashMapに追加と取得.question: Create a HashMap<String, Integer>, add "age" -> 25, and output the value of "age".

三項演算子.title: Ternary Operator
三項演算子.question: There is a variable age = 18. Use the ternary operator to output "Adult" if 18 or older, or "Minor" if younger.

例外処理.title: Exception Handling
例外処理.question: Attempting to convert string "abc" to an integer using Integer.parseInt() will throw an exception. Catch the exception with try-catch and output "Error".

For-Eachループ.title: For-Each Loop
For-Eachループ.question: Output each element of integer array {1, 2, 3, 4, 5} separated by commas. Use a for-each loop.

StringBuilderで文字列連結.title: Concatenate Strings with StringBuilder
StringBuilderで文字列連結.question: Use StringBuilder to concatenate "Hello", " ", "World" and output it.

2つの数の最大値.title: Maximum of Two Numbers
2つの数の最大値.question: Use Math.max() to output the maximum value of 15 and 25.

累乗の計算.title: Calculate Power
累乗の計算.question: Use Math.pow() to calculate 2 to the power of 3 and output it as an integer.

文字列の一部を抽出.title: Extract Part of String
文字列の一部を抽出.question: Extract and output characters from index 0 to 5 from string "Hello World".

文字列に特定の文字が含まれるか確認.title: Check if String Contains Specific Text
文字列に特定の文字が含まれるか確認.question: Check if string "Hello Java" contains "Java". If found, output "Found"; if not, output "Not found".

配列のコピー.title: Copy Array
配列のコピー.question: Copy integer array {1, 2, 3} and output the elements of the copied array separated by commas. Use Arrays.copyOf().

配列を昇順にソート.title: Sort Array in Ascending Order
配列を昇順にソート.question: Sort integer array {5, 2, 8, 1, 9} in ascending order using Arrays.sort() and output them separated by commas.

ラムダ式でフィルタリング.title: Filter with Lambda Expression
ラムダ式でフィルタリング.question: Filter only even numbers from an ArrayList and output them separated by commas. Use removeIf() and lambda expression.

列挙型の使用.title: Using Enum
列挙型の使用.question: Define a Day enum (MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY) and output MONDAY.

文字列を整数に変換.title: Convert String to Integer
文字列を整数に変換.question: Convert string "123" to an integer using Integer.parseInt(), add 10 to it, and output the result.

文字列フォーマット.question: Use String.format() to create and output the string "Name: John, Age: 25".

Continue文で3の倍数をスキップ.question: Output numbers from 1 to 10 except multiples of 3, separated by commas. Use the continue statement.

Break文で5以上でループを終了.title: Exit Loop at 5 or Above with Break Statement
Break文で5以上でループを終了.question: Loop from 1 to 10, and exit the loop when reaching 5. Output numbers 1 to 4 separated by commas.
